subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: While Amar’e Stoudemire struggled, Ronny Turiaf turned into an offensive innovator to help lead the Knicks to an uncharacteristically slow and methodical win.
snippet: While Amar’e Stoudemire struggled, Ronny Turiaf turned into an offensive innovator to help lead the Knicks to an uncharacteristically slow and methodical win.
